author: Special Correspondent
text:
The regular meeting of the Attur Municipality held on Thursday discussed the issue of transfer of the municipal shops to others within a period of one year in violation of the rules. Shenbagam Thambidurai (Independent) raised the issue at the meeting. She said that as per the norms, the shops should not be shifted to the name of others within an year of allotment of the same through auction. The councillor complained that of late the name transfer is being done in the Attur municipality within a year.

P. Umarani Pichakannan, Municipal Chairperson, said that this issue will be discussed and suitable action will be taken to put an end to this.
title: Action soon to end misuse of shops
